creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
description: two large branches of plum blossoms; upper branch mostly grey, lower branch dark grey/ black; two sets of calligraphy in different hands; R set has four columns with rectangular chop at UR and two square chops L of fourth column; L calligraphy has five columns with two square chops at L; larger square chops at LLC and LRC
markings: seven untranslated red chops: one at URC of image (rectangular), two to L of each calligraphy (square); one at LLC (square) and one at LRC (square)
portfolio: From from the album "Three Friends of Winter"
title: Leaf from album "Three Friends of Winter"
